DOC.brief_summary: To estimate efficacy safety dry biological amnion graft hysteroscopic lysis intrauterine adhesion .
DOC.brief_title: The Efficacy Safety Dried Biological Amnion Graft Patients With Intrauterine Adhesions
DOC.detailed_description: Allocation : Randomized Endpoint Classification : Safety/Efficacy Study Intervention Model : Parallel Assignment Masking : Single Blind ( Subject ) Primary Purpose : Prevention
DOC.criteria: age 2040 years； previously diagnostic hysteroscopy confirm adhesion score > 5， accord American Fertility Society （AFS）classification IUA； complain menstruation disorder reproductive dysfunction； inform consent . premature menopause , presence intrauterine lesion ( e.g . polyp , myoma , septum ) , presence severe intercurrent illness ( e.g . systemic disease , coagulative disorder , severe kidney liver disease ) , adhesion limit low uterine cavity cervical canal .
